By DCC/UFRR

PRISM Group Infrastructure

The PRISM Group is located at the Distributed Systems Laboratory in the following address, Federal University of Roraima (UFRR), Block III, at Av. Cap. Ene Garcez, 2413, Bairro Aeroporto, Boa Vista - RR.
The PRISM Group Laboratory has access to equipment provided by the Department of Computer Science at UFRR, such as:
  • Computers with internet access
  • Electronics Kits
  • Digital Oscilloscope
  • Analog and Digital Multimeters
  • Development Boards 8051, Raspberry Pi, and Intel Galileo



Come see our Research Group PRISM!
